attributes.action: keep staffordshire bull terriers of the Dangerous Dogs Act 1991
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we need to keep our beloved staffordshire bull terrier of the dangerous dogs act 1991, just image your dog being took of you, just because these  rif raf of many young people using them as weapons, its wrong and we know it is we need to make a stand now, if any body owns one of these loving dogs, they are the most loving dogs out, and brilliant with children. PLEASE SIGN  REMEMBER THERE IS NO SUCH THING OF A BAD DOG ONLY BAD OWNERS, and i think most of you will agree on that, its people who need to educated not the dogs.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to keep staffordshire bull terriers of the Dangerous Dogs Act 1991.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=saveourstaffords


Her Majesty's Government
